introText.heading: Certified Information Systems Security Professional (CISSP) is one of the gold standard and most sought information security certification for proving knowledge in Cybersecurity. CISSP Common Body of Knowledge (CBK) is a collection of 8 domains that covers all the comprehensive aspects of information security and CISSP domains explained. An applicant needs to show their expertise in each of the domains to gain the certification.
introText.text:
Training Duration: 84 Hours
Class: Twice in a week (Friday | Saturday)

features.title: List of Eight CISSP Domains Module
